metadata.title: CVE-2016-9179 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
lynx: It was found that Lynx doesn't parse the authority component of theURL correctly when the host name part ends with '?', and could instead betricked into connecting to a different host.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9179` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lynx - 2.8.9dev11-1
lynx-common - 2.8.9dev11-1
lynx-cur - 2.8.9dev11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lynx package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.9dev11-1').
